name: Treasure Hunter Whitebeard
text: You can Tribute 1 "Treasure" card face-up or face-down on the field: Special Summon this card. This card gains the ATK and DEF of a monster Tributed to Summon this card. If this card was Special Summoned by tributing a Spell/Trap card: this card is unaffected by that type of card. If this card is destroyed and sent to the GY: You can banish this card; Special Summon 1 Explorer monster from your Deck.
